text: Pasteur Street () is an important street in Tehran, Iran in which key government institutions are located. It is highly secured because of the presence of key institutions such as the office of the Iranian President, the center of Iran’s Revolutionary Guards Intelligence leadership, the center of the Assembly of Experts for the Leadership, and the Supreme National Security Council. Also Several military schools, the center of the Armed Forces Logistics and Center for Strategic Studies are located in the street.Tehran Worried after Drone Flies Near Khamenei OfficeIran shoots down a filming drone in Tehran over security concerns ==See also== * Niavaran Complex == References == ==External links== *Pictures of Tehran Category:Streets in Tehran Category:Diplomatic districts
title: Pasteur Street
